work.summary:
Spearheaded the complete modernization of Morocco's consular appointment platform (https://rdv.consulat.ma/), transforming a legacy .NET WebForms application into a modern .NET Core MVC solution. The platform enables Moroccans living abroad to book appointments, track requests, and submit complaints to consular services.
